So how Sasuke was looking through thr Uchiha's Jutsu library, he strumbles on a secret archive that hold several Sharingan Kinjutsu.

Two which interest him, the first one makes the target your slave peramently. The second one can rewrite history making a male in a female peramently.
15422.title: Sasuke (aka Duck-head)

154221.content:
( In this story, ninja graduate at 15)

Sasuke was going through the Uchiha's clan library. He had just got back from his first real mission outside of Konoha. It was a disaster, yes they won, Gato was dead and the Land of Wave was free. They quickly signed a treaty with The Land of Fire, for protection and trade.

They got another ninja, Haku the last of his clan. He had the kekkei Genkai Hyoton, Ice Release. Which was power no where near the power of the Sharingan, but powerful. To bad he wasn't a real girl, he looks like a girl. If was a girl, she could have an excellent choice to help him remake the Uchiha Clan.

The reason he thought it was disaster was because he was the only one who did anything. His other two teammates if you could call them that. Sakura the pink hair Kunoichi, was useless. She was to busy fowning over him to do anything. Naruto might have helped but only when he used that red Chakra.

Sasuke was furious, he thought he could do anything if he was powerful enough, but now he realized he needed a team to take down power opponents. One person can only do so much, he wanted another team. A team who took training seriously.

He slammed his fist into a wall, he was shocked when his fist went right then the wall. He felt emptyness, he quickly pulled his fist out and looked into the hole. He was stunned to fine a room behind the wall. He quickly knocked down the wall and entered the room. He lift a torch to get some light.

He had found a secret section of his clan library. He quickly looked over the few scrolls inside. Most where to advance for him or he felt were not worth his time. Then he found two and smiled. This two could be a big help to solving his problems.

One scroll had a way to make a target you slave peramently and the other can rewrite reality, changing a mle into a female peramently.

Sasuke grinned, with this he can make any Kunoichi his slave. Sakura might be useful after all, once he makes her his slave. He can make her take her training seriously, reports say he was nartual for being a medic and genjutsu master.

The other if it really works, Haku be a great wife.

Who does Sasuke go after first ?
154221.title: Secret Jutsus

1542212.content:
Sasuke decided to go after the Hyoton user first. Sasuke made sure to have both Kinjutsu done before he went after him soon to be her. Sasuke found Haku, training in an isolated training ground. He was alone, which will make things easiler. He snuck up on him, he used a giant tree as cover.

He activated his sharingan and focused on Haku. He quickly went over that hands signs and prayed it worked. Soon Haku glowed pink, as he was transformed. He already looked like a girl, buy suddenly his chest started to grow. Sasuke couldn't help but smirked. He imagined himself fucking her into submission.

Soon the glow died down. Sasuke smirked, as he approached her.

" Haku-chan." Said Sasuke, smirking.

The Hyoton user turned around, the first thing she saw was Sasuke's sharingan. He quickly used the enslavement Kinjutsu on her. Haku's eyes flashed red, as now she was now Sasuke's slave.

" Yes, master." Said Haku, bowing.

Sasuke smirked, " Good slave, now I want you to....

info.brief_description: You decide who gets a harem and how big it is.
info.description:
You get to choose a character from your favorite book, movie, comic, etc. and give them a group of wonderful women to love.

Rules:
1. No crossovers except in the crossover section.
2. No rape or vore (why no rape is obvious and vore just doesn't sit right with me).
3. Transformations, shrinking, and any similar plot devices (except for when they are part of the canon of that character, such as Danny Phantom or Jake Long) are only temporary.
4. The only exceptions to rule 3 are if the method that a character gets a harem has something to do with a plot device (for example, say that a hero's male villains get transformed into hot babes who are utterly in love with the hero).
5. Try to make your writing legible.
